title: Whitmer's Michigan Meltdown? with Tudor Dixon and David Sokol
itunes:title: Whitmer's Michigan Meltdown? with Tudor Dixon and David Sokol
description:
Six months ago, the polls said Gretchen Whitmer was 35 points and a lock for reelection. Now, Whitmer's lead has crashed to the single digits and Democrats are desperately flying in Barack Obama to bail her out. Charlie talks to Michigan's GOP Gubernatorial candidate Tudor Dixon about the interfaith coalition of parents uniting to topple Whitmer. Plus, Teton Capital CEO David Sokol joins to break down the Biden economy's inflationary death spiral.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
